amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for salaries and expenses of the Federal Maritime Commission by $900,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Federal Maritime Commission Salaries and Expenses by $900,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 249 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 249 (Roll no. 431).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
